name: MISP Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 MISP Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the MISP API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the MISP API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: attribute

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: UUID or numeric ID of the event
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event ID | 作用: UUID or numeric ID of the event | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 默认值: text | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: invited_by (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
org_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

attributeId.name: attributeId
attributeId.description: ID of the attribute to update
attributeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attribute ID | 作用: ID of the attribute to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

useJson.name: useJson
useJson.description: Whether to use JSON to specify the fields for the search request
useJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use JSON to Specify Fields | 作用: Whether to use JSON to specify the fields for the search request | 默认值: False

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: invited_by (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
org_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

org_id.name: org_id
org_id.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
org_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

information.name: information
information.description: Information on the event - max 65535 characters
information.natural_language_description: 参数名: Information | 作用: Information on the event - max 65535 characters | (必填项)

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: ID of the tag to update
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag ID | 作用: ID of the tag to update | (必填项)

feedId.name: feedId
feedId.description: ID of the feed to update
feedId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Feed ID | 作用: ID of the feed to update | (必填项)

galaxyId.name: galaxyId
galaxyId.description: UUID or numeric ID of the galaxy
galaxyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Galaxy ID | 作用: UUID or numeric ID of the galaxy | (必填项)

noticelistId.name: noticelistId
noticelistId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Noticelist ID | 作用: Numeric ID of the noticelist | (必填项)

organisationId.name: organisationId
organisationId.description: ID of the organisation to update
organisationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organisation ID | 作用: ID of the organisation to update | (必填项)

role_id.name: role_id
role_id.description: Role IDs are available in the MISP dashboard at /roles/index
role_id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Role ID | 作用: Role IDs are available in the MISP dashboard at /roles/index | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.description: ID of the user to update
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: ID of the user to update | (必填项)

warninglistId.name: warninglistId
warninglistId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Warninglist ID | 作用: Numeric ID of the warninglist | (必填项)
